title: RPM Package Manifest Schema
description: Schema for RPM manifest files used by libpkgmanifest library (https://github.com/rpm-software-management/libpkgmanifest)

version.description: The version of the manifest file. This should follow the semantic versioning format (x.y.z), where x, y, and z are integers.

packages.description: A mapping of architecture labels to arrays of packages. Each key represents an architecture (e.g., i686, x86_64, aarch64). The value is an array of package objects associated with that architecture.

repoid.description: Represents the ID of the RPM repository as defined in the repo file available to the package manager at the time of package installation.

url.description: The URL where the package can be downloaded. This is optional for packages from official repositories but must be provided for packages from third-party sources for full identification.

checksum.description: The checksum of the package in the format <algorithm>:<digest>. The checksum algorithm (e.g., SHA256, MD5) is followed by a colon and the digest (a string of hexadecimal digits). Only lowercase letters are supported.

size.description: The size of the package in bytes. Must be a non-negative integer.

nevra.description: The Name, Epoch, Version, Release, and Architecture (NEVRA) of the package.

srpm.description: The Name, Epoch, Version, Release, and Architecture (NEVRA) of the source package used to build this package.

module.description: The modular information about the package in the format <name>:<stream>.
